About Me

Hello, Welcome to my website!


I'm Dimitar a self-taught web developer who wants to learn more and evolve within the industry.


It started few years ago while I was trying to build a web site for my own purposes. I needed to learn HTML and CSS and I became familiar with them.


I haven't done some big and complexed projects yet, but I'm eager to be part of such environment and to be on top with the latest technologies in this constantly changing industry.

My Work

Image Slider

View Code

Image Slider Gallery, created with Javascript mouse events, where you can move the slider to left and right holding the mouse key down on it.

Image Gallery

View Code

Image Gallery with randomly sized images, aligined using CSS Grid.

Rock, Scissors, Papper Game

View Code

The famous "Rock, Scissors, Paper" game where the user plays against the computer. JavaScript and CSS animation are used for better UI.

JAWS Game

View Code

In this game the shark shows randomly from the waves, where the goal is to click on it as many times as you can.

Flipping Cards Game

View Code

The goal here is to match two cards and keep them flipped, until you have all the cards opened. CSS perspective property is used and Javasript to keep record on the cards.

CSS Animation

View Code Details

Simple funny animation which I created while trying to improve my CSS skills, with Javascript added for triggering and repeating the animation.
